Articles.Content:
Hello,

Is there already a mod which would add overheating indicator, mainly for spaceplanes? I know about ALT+F12, but I would prefer some better way.

Thanks

WIP, but here ya go: [http://goo.gl/yzEf1R](https://goo.gl/yzEf1R)

Sorry for the short post, here have a potato ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
